https://tmrev.io/movie/754870-Bjorn: Hurdles of Bureaucracy 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Björn and his girlfriend Anja have packed their suitcases, their flight to their long-awaited holiday leaves in three hours. But then Björn notices that his passport is out of date. He rushes off to the local authorities, and the odyssey begins that completely changes his life. Will he ever see Anja again? Bjorn: Hurdles of Bureaucracy
